thread.title: Gay Law Reform: An Open & Shut Case?
thread.title_full: Gay Law Reform: An Open & Shut Case?

title: Gay Law Reform: An Open & Shut Case?
text:
Topix › Pacific Travel › Gay Law Reform: An Open & Shut Case? Gay Law Reform: An Open & Shut Case? Next Story Prev Story 4 hrs ago Read more: Blaze 
This month South Australia celebrates 40 years of LGBTI law reform. Ron Hughes talks to Ian Purcell, co-curator of a special exhibition at the State Library charting the reforms and asking where to now? On September 17, 1975, South Australia became the first state in Australia to decriminalise homosexuality. Start the conversation, or Read more at Blaze.
